thread.title: Blockchain Could Be the Answer to Cybersecurity. Maybe.

author: Nir Kshetri
title: Blockchain Could Be the Answer to Cybersecurity. Maybe.
text:
One of the most promising cybersecurity tools that exists today is something many people have heard about but few fully understand: blockchain technology.
Commonly associated with bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies, blockchain has the potential to solve many cybersecurity problems and provide a built-in defense against cyberattacks. Before that can happen, however, it has to overcome some serious limitations.
But...
